title: biscuits
description: These simple biscuits are normally deep-fried, soaked in sugar syrup and served with thick, sweet milky desserts.
ingredients: 1 brown cardamom pod, seeds removed and ground to a powder in a pestle and mortar
1½ tsp fennel seeds, ground to a powder in a pestle and mortar
4 tbsp ghee or vegetable oil, for frying
